entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
